title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for interacting with Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat back-end.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper that adds conversation memory & prompt templates to ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight Node service that exposes Ollama as a GitHub Copilot-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or rankers.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama chat & code-generation commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama models as part of CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-grafana
summary: Grafana datasource plugin to visualize Ollama server metrics and GPU usage.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Scripts to convert & quantize Hugging Face models into Ollama Modelfile format.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcase of Ollama projects.
